title: Divine Diamond Floral Haaram with Gemstone Accents
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This breathtaking haaram showcases a modern take on traditional floral motifs. The intricate diamond setting, resembling delicate vines and blossoms, highlights the brilliance of each stone. A central Emerald and Ruby adds a touch of color. The floral pendants are accentuated with lustrous freshwater pearl drops (Gundla Mala style) creating a classic yet contemporary look. This haaram can be converted into two individual necklaces making it even more versatile.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for high-profile social events and festive occasions.
description: This exquisite Diamond Floral Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The piece is set with high-quality diamonds for maximum brilliance and fire, and the addition of premium gemstones makes it a luxury asset. The design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern sensibility, making it a versatile addition to your jewelry collection. Furthermore, this Haaram can be easily be converted into two individual necklaces. This piece is a heirloom-worthy investment, designed to be treasured for generations. Comes with certification for gold purity and diamond authenticity.
